rows.label: bf05140150_0010
rows.name:
When he was 2 years old,
he was brought to this village by his mother.

rows.label: bf05140150_0020
rows.name:
Maybe it was war, or a dying Divine Beast...
But they'd lost their home, sure enough.

rows.label: bf05140150_0030
rows.name:
By the time they arrived here,
she was terribly weakened.

rows.label: bf05140150_0040
rows.name: She asked me to look after Rex, and...

rows.label: bf05140150_0042
rows.name: That was the last thing she said.

rows.label: bf05140150_0070
rows.name:
We found his body about three
kilts away from here.

rows.label: bf05140150_0080
rows.name:
He came so far...
If only he'd made it a little farther.
